title: LINE Corporation : consolidated revenue 2013 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion Japanese yen for 27 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen of Quarter Q2 '13 is 7.41% smaller than the maximum value at Q4 '19.
min_summary: This bar chart has 27 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Revenue in billion Japanese yen in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion Japanese yen for 27 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen of Quarter Q2 '13 is 7.41% smaller than the maximum value at Q4 '19.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Revenue in billion Japanese yen for 27 number of Quarters.
The Revenue in billion Japanese yen is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 '19 and lowest at Quarter Q2 '13.
The second highest Revenue in billion Japanese yen is appeared to be the Quarter Q4 '18.
There is a difference of 52.6 between the maximum Quarter Q4 '19 and minimum Quarter Q2 '13.
Quarter Q4 '19 is higher than any other Quarters with value 60.8, followed by Q4 '18, and Q4 '18. Down to Quarter Q2 '13 with the lowest value 8.2.
Overall Revenue in billion Japanese yen has declined over the Quarters.
Quarter Q3 '19, and Q4 '18 share the same value 56.0.
The Quarter Q4 '19 has 1.65 times more Revenue in billion Japanese yen than average.
